feed.title: Vanilla OS Updates
feed.subtitle: Live feed of Vanilla OS updates and changes.

entry.title: Bug Fix: Newly created users were not able to complete the First Setup Wizard
entry.summary: Affected: Newly created users. Fixed in version: 2.2.3.

entry.title: Bug Fix: Some NVIDIA setups were unable to boot
entry.summary: Affected: NVIDIA users on some specific setups. Fixed in version: N/A.

entry.title: Enhancement: Support for custom images in the Installer
entry.summary: Users can now use their own system images during the installation process. Usefull for OEMs and users who need specific firmware or drivers. Version: 2.3.7.

entry.title: Enhancement: Support for new NVIDIA images in the installer
entry.summary: We have 2 different images for NVIDIA now, one for recent GPUs using the official Open NVIDIA drivers, one for old GPUs using the official proprietary NVIDIA drivers; the installer will automatically detect the hardware and pick the correct one. Version: N/A.

entry.title: Enhancement: New and improved translations
entry.summary: One or more of the supported languages have been updated. Version: N/A.
